space.arim.api.platform

Class AbstractTPSMeter

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.arim.api.platform.PlatformRegistrable
      • space.arim.api.platform.AbstractTPSMeter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TPSMeter, space.arim.universal.registry.Registrable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultTPSMeter, DefaultTPSMeter, DefaultTPSMeter

    public abstract class AbstractTPSMeter
extends PlatformRegistrable
implements TPSMeter
    An implementation of TPSMeter which simply runs a synchronous task every tick.
    The ticks per second is calculated each tick based on the difference between the current and previous run.
    Author:
    A248
